definedValues.description: Holding account.  Must be used as a destination of issuance(s), or as a source or destination of internal or external transfer, or as a source of cancellations or use

CooperativeApproach.description:
Cooperative approaches under Article 6.2.
The format of the string is "CANNNN" where the "CA" is the fixed prefix, and NNNN is a four-digit integer, that shall be incremented by one for each additional agreed cooperative approach, and added to his common nomenclature.

definedValues.description: Article 6.4 mechanism (between Parties to the Paris Agreement)
Promotion of climate smart agriculture practices for sustainable rice cultivation in Ghana (between Ghana and Switzerland)

Operation of e-buses on privately owned, scheduled public bus routes in the Bangkok Metropolitan area by Energy Absolute / Implementing Agreement to the Paris Agreement between the Kingdom of Thailand and the Swiss Confederation (between Switzerland and Thailand)

Emissions Reductions from Sustainable Management of Forests (by Guyana)

ITMOs resulting from Paris Agreement Article 5.2: reducing emissions from deforestation and forest degradation, and the role of conservation, sustainable management of forests and enhancement of forest carbon stocks (by Suriname)

Metric.description: The metric used to measure the ITMO

definedValues.description: ITMO is meansured in tonnes Carbon Dioxide equivalent
ITMO is not measured in tonnes Carbon Dioxide equivalent

TransactionType.description: Transaction types according to Decision 2/CMA.3, annex paragraphs 1-3 and 3/CMA.3, annex, paragraph 5

UnitSerialNumber.description:
Unique unit serial number is composed of three elements:
(a) Originating registry,
(b) Unit serial block start
(c) Unit serial block end.
.It is the responsibility of the originating registry (i.e., the party who issues the units), to ensure that the serial number is unique for its registry, regardless of the type of unit issued.  In other words, a new, consecutive serial number must be created by the originating registry each time it creates a new block of units.

Unit.description:
Article 6 units are composed of the following elements:
(a) Unit Serial Number
(b) Unit Type
(c) Cooperative Approach
(d) First Transferring Party
(e) Vintage (i.e. year)
(f) (Reference to) Mitigation Outcome(s)
(g) Authorisation Status
